ModMetaData.name: Master of Cooking
ModMetaData.author: leafzxg
ModMetaData.description:
Supported Languages: English Russian (русский) Korean (한국) Polish ChineseSimplified (简体中文) ChineseTraditional (繁體中文)
[Mod version: 1.3.0] Function: Allowed to make 5/10/20 simple/fine/lavish/survival meals in bulk Allowed to make 10/20 pemmican/wort/kibble in bulk Allowed to make 5/10/20 vegetarian fine/lavish meals in bulk *NEW FOR 1.3 Allowed to make 5/10/20 carnivore fine/lavish meals in bulk *NEW FOR 1.3
Features: Bulk production requires extra material. The more copies you make, the more mates you need per copy.(For example,make 20 meals in bulk requires 5% more extra material than the original.) The more copies you make, the less time you spend on per copy.
